item.title: Lesser-known C# features that can simplify your code
item.description: C# is a robust OOP language that provides the foundation for building almost every application with .NET. As a C# developer, you are likely familiar with its fundamentals. However, like any legacy technology, it holds more depth to explore and enhance your code's maintainability and beauty. In this Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/lesser-known-c-features-that-can-simplify-your-code/
